Contact

Let’s talk about your microbes, data systems, or storytelling needs.

Start a conversation

Email is the fastest way to reach me. Share context, constraints, and timelines—you don’t need a perfect scope to start.

Prefer a quick intro call? Book a 30-minute slot to connect.

Schedule a meeting
  • Email: edeyett@proton.me
  • Typical response time: 2–3 business days
  • Location: Remote (Eastern Time) with global collaborators

What to include (if you can)

  1. The scientific or organizational problem you’re trying to solve
  2. What data, systems, or communication pieces already exist
  3. Desired timelines, audiences, and success signals
  4. Any constraints around tooling, security, or collaboration style

Prefer to propose times instead? Send two or three time windows and we’ll align.
